name: visualbotcrafter
description: An awesome software to create and manage your own bots.

scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && tsc-watch --onSuccess "electron ."
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.copy-assets: shx mkdir -p dist/src && shx cp -r app/src/styles dist/src/ && shx cp -r app/src/assets dist/src/ && shx cp app/preload-esm.mjs dist/ && npm run copy-html
scripts.copy-html: shx cp app/src/builder.html dist/src/builder.html && shx cp app/src/index.html dist/src/index.html && node cross_platform/fix-paths.js
